data.description: A data type representing the NIEM data model, an IEPD, an EIEM, or another kind of NIEM-based data model.

definition.description: A definition for or description of a resource.

description.description: A detailed description of a model.

source.description: An authoritative source for the model.

contactInfo.description: A set of contact information for the model.

website.description: A URL for an informational website about this model.

items.description: A data type for a specific version or release of a model.

draft.description: A sub-version number, such as a pre-release identifier.

baseNIEM.description: A NIEM release that this resource is based on.

uri.description: A target namespace or other ID for this model package.

changeSummary.description: A summary of the changes from the previous package, if applicable.

location.description: A URL for the model package folder.

more.description: Any additional metadata to be captured.
Any additional metadata to be captured.

links.description: A data type for metadata about model-related resources.

href.description: A URI for the target resource.

packages.description: A data type for metadata about a singular resource related to the source resource.

label.description: A relative label for a resource, such as a version number or a qualified name.

href.description: A URI for the target resource.

data.name: NIEM
data.description: NIEM is a common vocabulary that enables efficient information exchange across diverse public and private organizations. NIEM can save time and money by providing consistent, reusable data terms and definitions, and repeatable processes.
